Dinotron cringes and shuts his eyes tight,waiting for Aerotaur's staff to hit 
him. 
He waits a while but nothing happens. 
He listen's to what Aerotaur says.
He was pretty shocked. Not a second ago they fighting to a possible death. 
"OK" he finally says," I will take to the Ark. But I warn you. Don't try 
anything funny with my backed turned." 
With that he transforms to beast mode and sets off towards the Ark.
"Follow me," he says, "We,re not that far."

this 
> moves the plot along.
> 
> ::Aerotron::
> � � He stops his thrust an inch away from Dinotron's head his left arm 
> shaking from the wounds inflicted by Dinotron's shots. �He raises and 
flexes 
> his hand and turns his head to face Dinotron. �He finally says "Enough of 
> this, I am your better. �Lead us to your base so the three of you can be 
> repaired. �I must speak with whomever is in charge there." �Out of the 
corner 
> of his eye he notices Whistler moving.
> 
> ::Whistler::
> � � With his head still groggy he awakens to find a truly impressive 
creature 
> there. �He instinctively knows that it was he that shot him. �He tries to 
sit 
> up but he could not. �With a feeble rasp he asks "Who ... are you? ... 
�Will 
> you ... help me?"
>
